ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: PurchaseOrder
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Purchase Order in the system. A Purchase Order is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be created with PurchaseOrderLine) Examples POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/PurchaseOrder { "businessPartner": "858B90C7AF0A4533863EEC65437382BF", "orderDate": "2025-10-02", "orderReference": "12345" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Purchase Orders from the system. A Purchase Order is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION:
Creates a Purchase Order in the system. A Purchase Order is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be created with PurchaseOrderLine).
Example: POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/PurchaseOrder { "businessPartner": "858B90C7AF0A4533863EEC65437382BF", "orderDate": "2025-10-02", "orderReference": "12345" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Purchase Order in the system. A Purchase Order is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be modified with PurchaseOrderLine).

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: BPCustomer
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Customer. To fill this data, the Business Partner must be created first. This is the same table as BusinessPartner, so the ID is the same as c_bpartner_id. You must use a Pricelist ID obtained by a search. The creditLimit is a number, by default 0.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Read the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Customer.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Customer. To fill this data, the Business Partner must be created first. This is the same table as BusinessPartner, so the ID is the same as c_bpartner_id. The boolean isCustomer must be true. You must use a Pricelist ID obtained by a search. The creditLimit is a number, by default 0.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modify the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Customer. To fill this data, the Business Partner must be created first. This is the same table as BusinessPartner, so the ID is the same as c_bpartner_id. The boolean isCustomer must be true. You must use a Pricelist ID obtained by a search. The creditLimit is a number, by default 0.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: PurchaseInvoiceLine
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION:
Crea, modifica o elimina líneas de facturas de compra en el sistema. Una línea de factura de compra está asociada a una factura (campo `invoice`) y contiene el producto, la cantidad, el precio unitario y el precio neto.
**Ejemplo:**
```json [ { "invoice": "3BDA413F5B134C07B6C5E2940C05861A", "product": "DA7FC1BB3BA44EC48EC1AB9C74168CED", "invoicedQuantity": "1", "unitPrice": 12.2 }, { "invoice": "A8D1F4686A5D41AA83968A61B277BA19", "product": "DA7FC1BB3BA44EC48EC1AB9C74168CED", "invoicedQuantity": "12", "unitPrice": 9.9 } ] ```
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Purchase Invoice Lines from the system. A Purchase Invoice Line is associated with an invoice and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies Purchase Invoice Lines in the system. A Purchase Invoice Line is associated with an invoice (field `invoice`) and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: BusinessPartner
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Business Partner in the system.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Reads Business Partners from the system. A Business Partner is a company or person that the company has a business relationship with (e.g. a customer, vendor, or employee).
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates a Business Partner in the system. A Business Partner is a company or person that the company has a business relationship with (e.g. a customer, vendor, or employee). - Parameter organization must be null if not provided - Parameter searchKey must be filled, with a random 6 letters if not provided.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Business Partner in the system. A Business Partner is a company or person that the company has a business relationship with (e.g. a customer, vendor, or employee).

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: Inventory
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION:
Creates/modify/deletes a Physical Inventory in the system. A Physical Inventory is a document that changes the stock of one or more products in a warehouse. Creation example with all details: POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/Inventory { "organization": "53FFD8C0BFB540949E0CA14636BD6062", "warehouse": "B2D40D8A5D644DD89E329DC297309055", "movementDate": "2025-01-01", "name": "Inventory 1" }
Creation example with only required fields: { "movementDate": "2025-01-01", "name": "Inventory 2" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Physical Inventories from the system. A Physical Inventory is a document that changes the stock of one or more products in a warehouse.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Physical Inventory in the system. A Physical Inventory is a document that changes the stock of one or more products in a warehouse.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: BPAddress
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Associate a location with a business partner. The business partner and the location must already be created in the system. This association is required for the third party to be able to use this location in the system. The field name must be a descriptive name for the location such as “office”, “home” or other. If not provided, make it up. The field locationAddress should have the ID of the Location created previously.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves the association between a business partner and a location.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Associate a location with a business partner. The business partner and the location must already be created in the system. This association is required for the third party to be able to use this location in the system. The field name must be a descriptive name for the location such as “office”, “home” or other. If not provided, make it up. The field locationAddress should have the ID of the Location created previously.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: SalesOrder
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Sales Order in the system. A Sales Order is a transactional document used to register the selling of items to a Business Partner/Customer. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be created with SalesOrderLines) Examples POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/SalesOrder { "businessPartner": "858B90C7AF0A4533863EEC65437382BF", "orderDate": "2025-10-02", "orderReference": "12345" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Sales Orders from the system. A Sales Order is a transactional document used to register the selling of items to a Business Partner/Customer.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION:
Creates a Sales Order in the system. A Sales Order is a transactional document used to register the selling of items to a Business Partner/Customer. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be created with SalesOrderLines).
Example: POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/SalesOrder { "businessPartner": "858B90C7AF0A4533863EEC65437382BF", "orderDate": "2025-10-02", "orderReference": "12345" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Sales Order in the system. A Sales Order is a transactional document used to register the selling of items to a Business Partner/Customer. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be modified with SalesOrderLines).

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: InventoryLines
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION:
Creates/modify/deletes a Physical Inventory Line in the system. A Physical Inventory Line belongs to a Physical Inventory and contains the product, stock amount and storage bin. Creation example all fields: POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/InventoryLines { "storageBin": "54EB861A446D464EAA433477A1D867A6", "product": "D71ED1FF939347478FEFE8F8F38CE345", "quantityCount": "5", "uOM": "100" }
Creation example with only required fields: { "product": "D71ED1FF939347478FEFE8F8F38CE345", "quantityCount": "5", "uOM": "100" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Physical Inventory Lines from the system. A Physical Inventory Line belongs to a Physical Inventory and contains the product, stock amount and storage bin.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Physical Inventory Line in the system. A Physical Inventory Line belongs to a Physical Inventory and contains the product, stock amount and storage bin.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: SalesOrderLines
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Sales Order Line in the system. A Purchase Order Line belongs to a Sales Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Sales Order Lines from the system. A Sales Order Line belongs to a Sales Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates a Sales Order Line in the system. A Sales Order Line belongs to a Sales Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Sales Order Line in the system. A Sales Order Line belongs to a Sales Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: LocationWebhook
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Create/modify/delete a Physical Location in the system. This Location is not associated to any Business Partner, so it is necessary to associate it after creating the location.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates a Physical Location in the system. This Location is not associated to any Business Partner, so it is necessary to associate it after creating the location.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: PurchaseInvoice
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Purchase Invoice in the system. A Purchase Invoice is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be created with PurchaseInvoiceLine) Examples POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/PurchaseInvoice { "businessPartner": "858B90C7AF0A4533863EEC65437382BF", "invoiceDate": "2025-10-02", "orderReference": "12345" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Purchase Invoices from the system. A Purchase Invoice is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION:
Creates a Purchase Invoice in the system. A Purchase Invoice is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be created with PurchaseInvoiceLine).
Example: POST sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/PurchaseInvoice { "businessPartner": "858B90C7AF0A4533863EEC65437382BF", "invoiceDate": "2025-10-02", "orderReference": "12345" }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Purchase Invoice in the system. A Purchase Invoice is a transactional document used to register the buying of items from a provider/vendor. This endpoint is valid only for the header (lines must be modified with PurchaseInvoiceLine).

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: BPVendor
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Vendor.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Reads the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Vendor.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Vendor. To fill this data, the Business Partner must be created first. This is the same table as BusinessPartner, so the ID is the same as c_bpartner_id. You must use a Pricelist ID obtained by a search. The creditLimit is a number, by default 0.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: modifies the specific data of a Business Partner that is a Vendor. To fill this data, the Business Partner must be created first. This is the same table as BusinessPartner, so the ID is the same as c_bpartner_id. You must use a Pricelist ID obtained by a search. The creditLimit is a number, by default 0.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: InventoryProcessWebhook
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Process an Inventory in the system. It receives the inventory_id as a param.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Process an Inventory in the system. It receives the inventory_id as a param.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: Product
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Product in the system. A Product represents a tangible or intangible item offered by the company, such as goods, services, or digital assets, that can be sold, purchased, or managed within the organization. Example of search by name using q parameter: "q":"searchKey==SKU004"
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION:
Retrieves Products from the system. A Product represents a tangible or intangible item offered by the company, such as goods, services, or digital assets, that can be sold, purchased, or managed within the organization.
Example of search by name using q parameter: "q":"searchKey==SKU004"
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates a Product in the system. A Product represents a tangible or intangible item offered by the company, such as goods, services, or digital assets, that can be sold, purchased, or managed within the organization.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Product in the system. A Product represents a tangible or intangible item offered by the company, such as goods, services, or digital assets, that can be sold, purchased, or managed within the organization.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: PurchaseOrderLines
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION:
Creates/modify/deletes a Purchase Order Line in the system. A Purchase Order Line belongs to a Purchase Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price. In the api the field is sended as salesOrder (with purchaseOrder Id)
Example: ----------- POST http://localhost:8080/etendo/sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/PurchaseOrderLines { "salesOrder": "3BDA413F5B134C07B6C5E2940C05861A", "product": "DA7FC1BB3BA44EC48EC1AB9C74168CED", "orderedQuantity": "1", "unitPrice": 12.2 } ----------- POST http://localhost:8080/etendo/sws/com.etendoerp.etendorx.datasource/PurchaseOrderLines { "salesOrder": "A8D1F4686A5D41AA83968A61B277BA19", "product": "DA7FC1BB3BA44EC48EC1AB9C74168CED", "orderedQuantity": "12", "unitPrice": 9.9 }
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Purchase Order Lines from the system. A Purchase Order Line belongs to a Purchase Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Purchase Order Line in the system. A Purchase Order Line belongs to a Purchase Order and contains the product, quantity, unit price and net price.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: ProductCategory
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes a Product Category in the system. A Product Category is a way to classify Products.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Product Categories from the system. A Product Category is a way to classify Products.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates a Product Category in the system. A Product Category is a way to classify Products.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies a Product Category in the system. A Product Category is a way to classify Products.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: BPCategory
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/Search a Business Partner Category in the system. A Business Partner Category is a way to classify Business Partners. For example, a company can have tiers of customers (e.g. Gold, Silver, Bronze) and can use Business Partner Categories to classify them.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Search a Business Partner Category in the system. A Business Partner Category is a way to classify Business Partners. For example, a company can have tiers of customers (e.g. Gold, Silver, Bronze) and can use Business Partner Categories to classify them.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates a Business Partner Category in the system. A Business Partner Category is a way to classify Business Partners. For example, a company can have tiers of customers (e.g. Gold, Silver, Bronze) and can use Business Partner Categories to classify them.

ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.NAME: ProductPrice
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.DESCRIPTION: Creates/modify/deletes the price of a specific Product in the system. To fill this data, the Product must be created first and there should be a Price List Version available.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.GET_DESCRIPTION: Retrieves Product Prices from the system. Shows the price of a specific Product.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.POST_DESCRIPTION: Creates the price of a specific Product in the system. To fill this data, the Product must be created first and there should be a Price List Version available.
ETAPI_OPENAPI_REQ.PUT_DESCRIPTION: Modifies the price of a specific Product in the system. To update this data, the Product must exist and there should be a Price List Version available.
